content:
#!/bin/bash

module load java/1.8.0_20 python/3.5.1 gcc/5.4.0

# usage: 
# remove the log, run a "does it move" test on milestone 5, & log it
#    rm ati/M05.io.log; ati/test_io M05 | tee ati/M05.io.log

echo "Processing " ${1} " : "

for dir in Submissions/${1}_*/* ; do
  found=''
  for d in "$dir"/*/doc/*.pdf ; do
    [ -f "$d" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    if [ $found ] ; then 
      echo ${gname} ",  extra pdf "
    else
      echo ${gname} ",  pdf "
    fi
    cp "$d" "reports/${gname}.pdf"
    found=1
  done
  if [ ! $found ] ; then 
    for w in "$dir"/*/doc/*.doc* ; do
      [ -f "$w" ] || continue
      gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
      if [ $found ] ; then 
        echo ${gname} ",  extra word "
      else
        echo ${gname} ",  word "
      fi
      cp "$w" "reports/doc/${gname}.docx"
      found=1
    done
  fi
  if [ ! $found ] ; then 
    for d in "$dir"/*/*.pdf ; do
      [ -f "$d" ] || continue
      gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
      echo ${gname} ", misplaced pdf "
      cp "$d" "reports/${gname}.pdf"
      found=1
    done
  fi
  if [ ! $found ] ; then 
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo $gname ", missing!" ; 
    echo "Missing documentation" > "reports/doc/${gname}.txt"
  fi
  #echo
  #echo "======================================================================================="
  #echo
done
